description: It's time to get your fajitas on with this recipe for slow-cooker chicken fajitas. Serve with your choice of toppings for a fun family dinner.
keywords: Fajita,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,May 2021,Autumn,Chicken,Avocado,Slow cooker,Peanut free
name: Slow-Cooker Chicken Fajitas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 red capsicums (halved, deseeded, cut into thick strips)
1 green capsicum (halved, deseeded, cut into thick strips)
0.5 bunch coriander (leaves picked, chopped, stalks roughly chopped)

recipeInstructions.text: Place chicken, seasoning and paprika in a 5.5L slow cooker, tossing chicken to coat. Top with capsicums, onion, tomatoes, paste, coriander stalks, vinegar and garlic. Stir to combine. Drizzle over oil and cook, covered, on low for 6 hours (or on high for 4 hours) or until chicken is cooked through and tender.
Transfer chicken to a heatproof bowl and, using 2 forks, coarsely shred. Return chicken to slow cooker and stir in beans and coriander leaves. Season.
To serve, top tortillas with chicken mixture, avocado, jalapeno and sour cream.
